name: accessibility
title: Accessibility Statement
text:
Accessibility Statement for Bellingham Rental Reviews

My Commitment

I am committed to ensuring that this website is accessible to individuals with disabilities. I am continually working to evaluate and test all areas of this website to conform with WCAG 2.1 AA guidelines.

Technical specifications

Accessibility of Bellingham Rental Reviews relies on the following technologies to work with the particular combination of web browser and any assistive technologies or plugins installed on your computer:

  1. HTML
  2. WAI-ARIA
  3. CSS
  4. JavaScript

Measures to support accessibility

I have taken the following measures to ensure accessibility of Bellingham Rental Reviews:

  1. Include an accessibility statement
  2. Evaluate the web pages with the following tools:
    1. Deque Labs aXe browser extension
    2. WebAIM Color Contrast utility
    3. ORCA screen reader software
    4. NVDA screen reader software

Conformance status

The Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) defines requirements for designers and developers to improve accessibility for people with disabilities. It defines three levels of conformance: Level A, Level AA, and Level AAA. Bellingham Rental Reviews is partially conformant with WCAG 2.1 level AA. Partially conformant means that some parts of the content do not fully conform to the accessibility standard.

Feedback

I welcome any feedback on the accessibility of Bellingham Rental Reviews. Please feel free to reach out to me at hello@bhamrentalreviews.com if you encounter accessibility barriers. I will try to respond to feedback within 5 business days, if not sooner.
